name: Arcana
description: Understanding of magical phenomena, spells, and enchantments. Identify magical effects, decipher arcane symbols, discern magical item properties.

name: Examination
description: Aptitude for thorough analysis and deduction. Diagnose injuries, determine causes of death, uncover clues, unravel trap and mechanical device workings.

name: Finesse
description: Ability to use hands and feet in careful ways. Pick locks, disarm traps, pilot vehicles, tinker, steal or plant items, climb, precise careful movement.

name: Influence
description: Persuasiveness, charm, and ability to influence others. Convince or deceive people, negotiate deals, build trust, win allies, put on captivating performances.

name: Insight
description: Understanding people and situations beyond the obvious. Sense motives, detect lies, read hidden emotions, make sense of clues.

name: Lore
description: History of civilization, kingdoms, and religions. Recall historical events, grasp cultural significance. Knowledge of celestials, dragons, fey, fiends, giants, humanoids, and undead.

name: Might
description: Apply strength effectively. Lift heavy objects, break through obstacles, climb, swim, jump, and perform feats of strength.

name: Naturecraft
description: Wilderness survival, navigation, tracking, and animal handling. Thrive in the wild, identify flora and fauna, track creatures.

name: Perception
description: Ability to notice subtle details. Spot hidden objects, detect secret passages, sense environmental changes, sense being followed or observed.

name: Stealth
description: Proficiency in staying unseen and moving quietly. Hide, slip past guards, evade detection, move without drawing attention.
